text: Carol Lee Scott (20 December 1942 â€“ 4 July 2017) was an English entertainer. She was best known for her role on British television in the 1980s and 1990s as "Grotbags". Throughout her career, Scott regularly performed on the international cabaret circuit, and prior to her TV work, she was a singer and released two albums. Scott died of cancer in London on 4 July 2017 at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:English television actors Category:English singers Category:English television presenters Category:Actors from Somerset
title: Carol Lee Scott
